Web_Spitter.help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
Web_Spitter.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} entangles {PlayerDest} in their {PowerName} immobilizing and slowing them.
Web_Spitter.victimHit: {PlayerSource} entangles you in their {PowerName} immobilizing and slowing you.

Resistance.help: Armor plating gives Arachnobot Disrupter some resistance to smashing and lethal damage. They are generally well insulated to resist energy damage and EMP attacks. As machines, they are very resistant to psionic damage. Arachnobots are good jumpers and are very fast.

Power_Jumping.help: Arachnobots can jump very high and travel very fast.
